name: H3x0r deluxe
overview: h3x0r 1k was created for MiniGame compo 2009, it is hexagonal gem swapping game (similar to Bejewelled) that use selfchanging code to fit into 1024 bytes. h3x0r deluxe is deluxe edition of same game, it was finished in 2010 and won 3rd place in ABBUC sw contest 2010. To play, place the cursor over a gem, click then move to an adjacent gem that you want to swap with, and click. If the move results in a 4 in a row (or more) the swap will happen and the matching row will be removed. A timer on the right side counts down the time you have left for a move, but it reset based on successful moves.
